description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Memorias do Grande Exercito Alliado Libertador do Sul da America, na guerra de 1851 a 1852 ... e bem assim dos factos mais graves ... que precederam-na, desde vinte annos ... incluindo-se tãobem noções exactas ... da batalha de Ituzaingo, em 1827, etc. [With two maps.]" Author: TITÁRA, Ladisláu dos Santos. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9772.bbb.9." Page: 159 Place of Publishing: Rio Grand do Sul Date of Publishing: 1852 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003643127 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
